data.opp_skill_req: Client servicing,Internet usage,Leadership,Organisational Management,Presentation skills,Team Management,Windows PC usage

logistics_info.support_for_destination: Will be dropped to the office on the first day to help understand the daily travel route.
logistics_info.accommodation_additional_info: Will be in the range of 100 to 120 dollars.
logistics_info.transportation_additional_info: Will be covered during the induction interview after matching.

legal_info.departure_info: Will be helped to reach the airport.

role_info.learning_points:
Building a start-up.
Team building and management.
role_info.expected_results:
Proper establishment of customer and product base.
Creating a sustainable process that is successful and proper branding of the organization
role_info.development_spaces: Invitation to AIESEC forums and activities and training meets to help understand AIESEC and develop interpersonal and professional skills.
role_info.required_preparation: Understanding how Marketing, sales and business development work in a company.
